channel.title: why there is no internet connection in my windows vm with whonix gateway
channel.description: I wonder why there is no internet connection in my windows vm with whonix gateway. My windows vm works fine without whonix gateway and can connect to the internet normally. However, every time I choose internal network whonix, my windows vm just can't connect to the internet. I do the whonixcheck on my whonix gateway and everything shows fine. Any idea what can be the problem?

item.title: why there is no internet connection in my windows vm with whonix gateway
item.dc:creator: entr0py
item.description:
1. Internal network name is cap-sensitive.
  2. You need to configure the network within WinVM.

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Other_Operating_Systems#Easy

Read full topic
item.source: why there is no internet connection in my windows vm with whonix gateway
